Module info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.belousov.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.belousov.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler, info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
The Implementor class implements the JarImpler interface and provides methods for generating default implementations of given interfaces and packaging them into a JAR file. Can also be launched as a standalone program.
Author:
Belousov Timofey

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method of the Implementor class which provides the command-line interface for using the class. Takes two arguments: the fully qualified name of the class to be implemented and the path to the output JAR file. If the arguments are not provided, prints the usage instruction and returns.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments split by a whitespace

    • getFullyQualifiedTypeName

      private static String getFullyQualifiedTypeName(Type type)
      Returns the fully qualified name of a given Type, replacing inner class separator characters with package separator characters.
      Parameters:
      type - the Type whose fully qualified name to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the fully qualified name of the given Type.

    • getImplName

      private static String getImplName(Class<?> token)
      Returns the name of the implementation class for a given Class token, appending the "Impl" suffix.
      Parameters:
      token - the Class token for which to retrieve the implementation name.
      Returns:
      the name of the implementation class for the given Class token.

    • getImplFile

      private static Path getImplFile(Class<?> token, Path root, String extension)
      Returns the Path of the implementation file for a given Class token, relative to the given root directory and with the given file extension.
      Parameters:
      token - the Class token for which to retrieve the implementation file Path.
      root - the classpath of the generated files.
      extension - the file extension of the implementation file (can be ".java" or ".class")
      Returns:
      the Path of the implementation file for the given Class token.

    • getImplPath

      private static Path getImplPath(Class<?> token, Path root)
      Returns the path of a generated implementation java source file, relative to the given root directory.
      Parameters:
      token - the class to be implemented.
      root - the classpath of the generated files.
      Returns:
      the path of a java source generated implementation file.

    • getCompiledPath

      private static Path getCompiledPath(Class<?> token, Path root)

      Parameters:
      token - the class to be implemented.
      root - the classpath of the generated files.
      Returns:
      the path of a java generated implementation classfile.

    • getContextClasspath

      private static Path getContextClasspath(Class<?> token) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Returns the classpath of a given token. If the token doesn't have a classpath (like in case it is a built-in java token), null is returned
      Parameters:
      token - the class to return the classpath of.
      Returns:
      the classpath of a given token. Can be null.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if unable to obtain the classpath.

    • compile

      private static void compile(Path cp, Path out, Path srcFile, Path contextClasspath) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Compiles the generated Java source file. Source files must be located at srcFile. The resulting class files are written to the directory located at out. All dependant classes have to be located inside the cp.
      Parameters:
      cp - the classpath directory of the generated source files
      out - the directory where the compiled class files should be written to
      srcFile - the path to the source file to compile
      contextClasspath - the classpath that includes all the srcFile dependant resources, or null if none
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if an error occurs during the compilation process or the compiler cannot be accessed.

    • cleanup

      private static void cleanup(Path path) throws IOException
      Recursively deletes the specified file or directory.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file or directory to delete. null values are ignored.
      Throws:
      IOException - if any I/O error occurs during the deletion process

    • packSingleJar

      private void packSingleJar(Path compileRoot, Path jarPath, Class<?> implToken) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Packs a single compiled implementation class file into a JAR archive. Takes the implemented class token to extract a proper classpath to its dependencies.
      Parameters:
      compileRoot - the root classpath directory of the compiled class files
      jarPath - the path to the JAR archive to create
      implToken - the class or interface being implemented
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if any error occurs during the JAR packaging process
      IllegalArgumentException - if the resulting jar file appears to have any entries that are too long

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Generates a class implementing the provided interface and saves it to the specified classpath directory. Generated class is provided as source java code, all implemented methods have the default implementation: they all ignore any provided parameters and return:
      • null in case of any non-primitive type
      • 0 in case of a primitive numeric type
      • false in case of boolean
      Only methods with no default implementation are generated.
      Specified by:
      implement in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler
      Parameters:
      token - the interface to implement
      root - the root classpath directory to write the implementation source code to
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if the specified token parameter is not an interface or cannot be implemented, or the generated implementation cannot be written to the requested file

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Generates a class implementing the provided interface and saves it to a JAR file. Implementation is generated the same way as in implement(Class, Path)
      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - the interface to implement
      jarFile - the path to the JAR file to create
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if the requested token cannot be implemented (any exception that implement(Class, Path) may throw, or the error occurred during writing the target jar or any intermediate files or the generated java code cannot be compiled or the compiled classfile cannot be packed into a JAR
      See Also:
      • implement(Class, Path)
